heading: Non ewe ranin menenium aramas meinisin repwe mwareiti ewe Samon—I epwe nonnom neir—Anonno ngeni Isaiah 12. Arap ngeni 559–545 Ier Mwen Kraist.

verses.txt: Iwe non ena ran kopwe apasa: O Samon, upwe mwareituk; inamo ika ka song rei om song a kunnuno, iwe ka ekinamweiei.
Nengeni, Kot i ai chon amanau; upwe apinukunuk, iwe usap nuokus; pun ewe Samon Siowa i ai pochokun me ai kon; i a pwan winiti ai chon amanau.
Iei minne, ren pwapwa upwe ififiu konik seni ekkewe puachetan konikin amanau.
Iwe non ena ran ami oupwe apasa: Mwareiti ewe Samon, kokkori itan, affatano an kewe foffor me nein ekkewe aramas, oupwe pwarano pwe itan mi tekia.
Kön ngeni ewe Samon; pun i a fen fori mettoch mi echipwer; ei a fateno non unusen ewe fonufan.
Puchoreu me apwas, ami aramasen Zion; pun mi napanap ewe Emon mi Fel re Israel mi nom me neimi.
